articles.title: Imran Khan Says He Is Not "Anti-Indian" Or "Anti-American" - NDTV
articles.description: Claiming that he was not "anti-Indian or anti-American" or against any country, Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan on Monday said he wanted good relations with all nations based on mutual respect.
articles.content:
"I am not against any country. I am not anti-Indian or anti-American," Imran Khan said (File)
